Classes
Store A convenience wrapper around RDF stores.

Function Summary
  open(store, handlers, base_uri)
Open an RDFAccess store accessing the given 'store', using the given 'handlers', and employing the given, optional 'base_uri'.
  unique(l)

Function Details

open(store, handlers, base_uri=None) 

Open an RDFAccess store accessing the given 'store', using the given
'handlers', and employing the given, optional 'base_uri'.
